# coder delete

Delete a workspace

## Usage

```console
coder delete <workspace> [flags]
```

## Flags

### --orphan

Delete a workspace without deleting its resources. This can delete a<br/>workspace in a broken state, but may also lead to unaccounted cloud resources.
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |
| Default | <code>false</code> |

### --yes, -y

Bypass prompts
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |
| Default | <code>false</code> |
